snippet: A crusading editor revered in India’s liberal circles, Tarun Tejpal, has been arrested in connection with the sexual assault of a young employee at his magazine.
abstract: Indian editor Tarun Tejpal, revered in nation's liberal circles, is arrested in connection with sexual assault of young employee at his magazine Tehelka; managing editor Shoma Chaudhury steps down after many are angered by her attempt to treat incident as internal matter.
lead_paragraph: A crusading editor revered in India’s liberal circles, Tarun Tejpal, has been arrested in connection with the sexual assault of a young employee at his magazine.

headline.main: Indian Editor Is Arrested in Assault of Employee
headline.print_headline: Indian Editor Is Arrested In Assault
